entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 8:20 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:20 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 8:20 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
